```
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.SimpleShapeResize/3, where GetParam() = "dart" (3684 ms)
```

DART used to pass this test with `DARTCollisionDetector` but not with `FCLMeshCollisionDetector`. `FCLMeshCollisionDetector` doesn't support updating dimension of created collision shapes.
